title: How to Make a Cabbage and Onion Sandwich

steps.headline: Take two slices of bread.
steps.description: Place two bread slices ontop a plate and decide if you want the bread toasted or not.

steps.headline: Slice cabbage and onion (long pattern).
steps.description: Using a sharp knife, cut the onion and cabbage into long thin slices then place them into a bowl and begin to mix them together.

steps.headline: Take a bread slice and put the chopped cabbage and onion in it.
steps.description: Place a generous amount of the onion and cabbage mixture onto a slice of bread.

steps.headline: Layer it with Mayonnaise.
steps.description: Spread some mayonnaise onto the sandwich bread evenly with a knife or spoon.

steps.headline: Cover it with another bread slice.
steps.description: Complete the sandwich by placing the other slice of bread ontop and pushing down on it gently to prevent the sandwich from falling apart when eating.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Cut the sandwich in two and place it onto a clean plate. Get yourself something to drink, you can have it with milk, coffee, juice, or another beverage.

text: Take two slices of bread. Place two bread slices ontop a plate and decide if you want the bread toasted or not. Slice cabbage and onion (long pattern). Using a sharp knife, cut the onion and cabbage into long thin slices then place them into a bowl and begin to mix them together. Take a bread slice and put the chopped cabbage and onion in it. Place a generous amount of the onion and cabbage mixture onto a slice of bread. Layer it with Mayonnaise. Spread some mayonnaise onto the sandwich bread evenly with a knife or spoon. Cover it with another bread slice. Complete the sandwich by placing the other slice of bread ontop and pushing down on it gently to prevent the sandwich from falling apart when eating. Serve. Cut the sandwich in two and place it onto a clean plate. Get yourself something to drink, you can have it with milk, coffee, juice, or another beverage.
